title: Love — Wikipedia
snippet: Love is a set of emotions and behaviors characterized by intimacy, passion, and commitment.

title: Love | Definition & Meaning — Britannica
snippet: Love, in its various forms, acts as a major facilitator of social bonding and human connection.
